Class FlightDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.nure.kolesov.SummaryTask4.db.dao.FlightDAO

  • public class FlightDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores CRUD methods for flight table in DB.

      • create

        public static boolean create(long id,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             int departure,
                             int arrival,
                             java.sql.Date date,
                             int crewId,
                             int statusId)
                      throws DBException
        Create flight and put it into DB.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the created flight
        name - Name of the created flight
        departure - Id of the airport, flight departures from
        arrival - Id of the airport, flight arrives from
        date - Date of the departure of the created flight
        crewId - Id of the crew of the created flight
        statusId - Status id of the created flight
        Returns:
        flag True, id the flight was created
        Throws:
        DBException
